descriptions: This application is built with FiCsJS and does not use any other JavaScript frameworks.
"FiCs"stands for Framework-independent Components. It enables the development of flexible components without dependency on any framework.
While FiCsJS is specialized for component development, it makes development of web applications entirely with FiCsJS possible, since it also provides routing and state management features.
features: The ability to develop flexible components without dependency on any framework
Harmony with the JavaScript ecosystem by avoiding syntactic sugar
Browser-native due to being based on Web Components
topPage.conversion: Now, let's try using the ToDo App built with FiCsJS!
